questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years, i will be a famous reporter. I hope that i will have a nice family with my actual girlfriend and two childrens: one guy and one girl.
I will have a beagle and a big cat cause I love animals and I don't see my life without us. I hope , im going to stop to smoke anymore.
